metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010060 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: NASA CFITSIO prior to 3.43 is affected by: Buffer Overflow. The impact is:arbitrary code execution. The component is: over 40 source code files werechanged. The attack vector is: remote unauthenticated attacker. The fixedversion is: 3.43. NOTE: this CVE refers to the issues not covered byCVE-2018-3846, CVE-2018-3847, CVE-2018-3848, and CVE-2018-3849. One exampleis ftp_status in drvrnet.c mishandling a long string beginning with a '4'character.

criterions.comment: cfitsio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
